annotation: The text description of a 'box' and its dimensions (19, 10, 7) is inconsistent with the provided image, which shows a pyramid. The geometric facts are extracted solely from the image. The goal 'Calculate the area of the divider' is interpreted as finding the area of the triangular cross-section PAC, as its altitude PM is explicitly marked in the diagram.
problem_text_en:
This box is to have a divider placed in as shown. The box has sides of length 19 cm, 10 cm and 7 cm.
Calculate the area of the divider correct to two decimal places, using your rounded answer from the previous part.
